comment.author: 60302515@N05
comment._content: Mochudi Homecrafts Centre in BOTSWANA (NOT Northern Rhodesia) belonged to the Dutch Reformed Church Mission to Botswana. Reported on 6th March 2011 to have been burnt to the ground. Ladies in the picture currently unknown. www.mmegi.bw/index.php?sid=6&aid=5118&dir=2010/Se...
